amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert a new Division B entitled "American Energy Act".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a new Division B entitled "American Energy Act".

action.text: Mr. Edwards (TX) raised a point of order against the Bishop (UT) amendment (A001). Mr. Edwards of Texas stated that the amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
